author: archie
msg: Convert libjc from a shared library to a static library. This has two benefits:
- More portable (it no longer needs to dlopen() itself).
The downside is that the new list (in libjc/native_lib.c) of all native methods
implemented by code in the libjc/native subdirectory must be manually kept

author: sebor
msg: (test_tm): Called it and exercised the "%{t}" format
string for the formatting of struct tm values.
